      public void removeCellByShot​(Cell cell)
      implemented for attack any cell
      Parameters:

    • generateShipOnTable

      public Object[] generateShipOnTable​(Cell toStart, Cell toFinish, ShipRepository shipRepo)
      Adds ship to shipRepository
      Parameters:
      toStart - Cell from which one ships starts
      toFinish - last Cell of ship
      shipRepo - represents ShipRepo where all modification will apply
      Returns:
      Object with status and ship generated

    • removeShipByInitialAndFinalCell

      public Object[] removeShipByInitialAndFinalCell​(Cell initialCell, Cell finalCell)
      Removes ship by start Cell and finish Cell
      Parameters:
      initialCell - the first Cell which belongs to ship which method will remove
      finalCell - the last Cell which belongs to ship which method will remove
      Returns:
      Status with removed ship

    • removeShipByCell

      public Object[] removeShipByCell​(Cell removeShip)
      Method removes Ship which contains cell
      Parameters:
      removeShip - with selected cell it is possible to remove concrete ship
      Returns:
      Status and ship to remove

    • downgradeShipWithCell

      public Object[] downgradeShipWithCell​(Cell cell, ShipRepository shipRepo)
      Downgrades ship of player on board
      Parameters:
      cell - cell will be removed from ship to downgrade after all controls
      shipRepo - ShipRepository where there will be happen updates
      Returns:
      Object with Status and downgraded ship and old one

    • upgradeShipWithCell

      public Object[] upgradeShipWithCell​(Cell cell, ShipRepository shipRepo)
      Method removes one ship from ShipRepository and adds another
      Parameters:
      cell - to upgrade Ship
      shipRepo - ShipRepository where can be found upgraded ship
      Returns:
      Object with status, added ship to shipRepository and deleted ship from ShipRepository
